It's important today.

  • Putin said that what was going on in the Ukrainian direction was Russia ' s fate.

  • In the Zaporace direction, the FRF increased hostilities

  • London wants to impose sanctions on Naval's death.

  • At night, the Vorosilov district of Donetsk was fired at by the SSA

  • The French General made a surprise statement about Donbas.

  • Trump called Bayden as President with the lowest IQ

  • Ukraine may lose other cities.

  • Pezkov: Putin congratulated the Russian military on taking Avdeevki

  • The Netherlands called on the EU to stop whining because of the possible triumph victory

  • Achmat Kadirov was given an order and appointed to a high post

  • Secretary of State Vatican Pietro Parolin expressed condolences on the death of Alexei Naval

Media news2

World

18.02.2024 05:08

Trump called Bayden as President with the lowest IQ

Donald Trump called Joe Byden as President of the Lowest IQ in the history of the United States.

18.02.2024 06:17

The former head of the German counter-intelligence created the right party

The former head of the German counter-intelligence service, Hans-Georg Maassen, established a new right-wing party, the Union of Values.

18.02.2024 02:16

The Netherlands called on the EU to stop whining because of the possible triumph victory

The Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rütte, called on Europe to stop whining and mourning because of the possible entry into power in the United States of America of Donald Trump after the presidential elections in that country.

17.02.2024 21:21

In Munich, Zelena was awkward about US assistance.

On Saturday, 17 February, Vladimir Zelensky, the President of Ukraine made awkward joke about U.S. assistance, in response to a question from the leading Christian Amanpur, journalist CNN.

17.02.2024 20:47

Flying from Moscow to Istanbul Boeing 737-800 returned to Sheremievo because of the suffocation on board.

On Saturday, 17 February, Boeing 737-800, from Moscow to Istanbul, requested a landing at the airport of departure a few minutes after the flight.

17.02.2024 19:05

In Canada, a couple broke up on the eve of the wedding because the guests refused to give $1,500 to the wedding.

In Canada, the bride cancelled the wedding and then broke up with the fiancé because the guests destroyed their plans for the event.

17.02.2024 18:40

It became known about the Munich demonstration against the security conference.

In Munich, there is a march that protests against the holding of an international conference on security, informs the German police in social media, assessing the number of participants in about 1,000 persons.

17.02.2024 17:56

In the first post-Reft of the United Nations, the United Nations responded to a statement by Yulia Naval in Munich

According to the First Deputy Prime Minister of Russia to the United Nations, Dmitry Polanski, the participation of Julia Naval at the Munich Conference on Security on the day of her husband ' s death is a misunderstanding.

17.02.2024 16:51

In the CPD, they assured that they would not use nuclear weapons first.

Minister for Foreign Affairs of China, Van I, confirmed that China was not considering the use of nuclear weapons first against other countries, including Ukraine. This statement was made to them at the Munich Conference on Security.

17.02.2024 15:34

" Now officially " : Naval confirmed his death

According to the Russian media, the body was moved to the morgue in Salehard.

17.02.2024 15:27

The record of Russians in Turkey has become known

In January this year, Russian citizens continued to actively acquire real property in Turkey, buying 555 lots.

17.02.2024 15:07

The beans damaged 200-year-old beams in Germany

The animals didn't resist the trees from starvation, as the professionals explained.

17.02.2024 14:04

A resident of America found in his wall in the bathroom grenade of the Second World War.

The weapon was unloaded.

17.02.2024 08:11

Japan successfully launched a heavy-grade H3 launch vehicle into space

Launching is important for Japan ' s increased competitiveness in the international market.

17.02.2024 04:45

The Presidents of France and Ukraine signed an agreement on security assurances

The Treaty will remain in force until Ukraine joins NATO.

17.02.2024 02:19

General IAS Tarnawski: Ukrainian military retreats from positions in Avdeevka

Several U.S. soldiers were captured.

16.02.2024 20:38

The collection of signatures for the release of Saakashvili was announced in Georgia

The former President ' s supporters want to give a document to the current National Chancellor for a decision to release the serving Saakashvili.

16.02.2024 20:15

There will be a multi-pronged olympiad for CIS countries in Uzbekistan

The winners of the Olympics can count on entering the Kazan National Research Technical University.

16.02.2024 18:49

In Germany, suspects in the murder of Ukrainian Basketballist Vladimir Jermakova

Four people have been arrested so far.

16.02.2024 17:44

The European Union expressed concern over the statements made by NATO Tramp

The former President of the United States stated that America would not support NATO countries.

16.02.2024 17:25

British universities threatened banks that continue to finance fossil fuel production

The universities that are under pressure from students and employees want to cooperate with greener financial organizations.

16.02.2024 16:37

In France, a Russian cheerleader convicted of riots on Euro-2016 was released.

The Russian marshmallows, after the match with the English prefabricated, organized a disturbance at the stadium and in the centre of Marcel, which resulted in the handicapping of one of the fighters.

16.02.2024 14:58

United States senators will visit Hungary

The United States Congress is planning to visit Budapest on 18 February. The senators intend to discuss the strategic issues of Hungarian engagement with NATO.

16.02.2024 12:20

The U.S. will be tried by the FBI Smirnov's informant for the Baden case.

Former FBI informant Alexander Smirnov is charged with making false statements about Joe Byden's involvement in his son Hunter's relationship with Burisma.

16.02.2024 12:06

Egypt is building a wall near Rafah in southern Gaza

The Egyptian authorities began building a wall near Rafah in the south of Gaza, reported the New York Times.
